page.title: 01ST MARY'S
page.content: St.Marys is the biggest island in the Isles of Scilly.It has the most shops, hotels,guest houses and most of the industry.Hugh Town is the highest populated area,the whole Island has a population of one thousand five hundred local people. The main industries of the Island are flowers,potatoes and tourists. The Island has an aquable climate. Spring comes early and the winter months experience much milder conditions than that of the Mainland. the Island can be reached by both sea and air. The Scillonian, a ferry service from Penzance,comes daily in the summer and a regular helicopter service also goes between penzance and St Mary's several times a day.
